title: 121 - Billy Tubes: The Preeminent Pokem√≥n Card Collector
description: On today's show, the guys play the video of Bill opening new packs of Pokemon cards on his Twitch stream and the incredible reaction he had when opening some new packs, Mitt gives some examples about how crackheads have allegedly gotten over on him in the past, they chat about the Britney Spears documentary which apparently is a little tough to watch, and jump into a loaded Pod FOD including questions about National Pizza Day, which movies coming out in 2021 they're most excited about, hackers poisoning the water supply in Florida after hacking into the main frame, the dangers of black ice, North West allegedly being the next Bob Ross, and much more.
